mapper.insert: insert into USER_USER(user_id, department_id, user_role, user_email, user_name, user_pw, user_cell, user_birth, user_active, user_position, user_regdate) values (#{user_id}, #{department_id}, #{user_role}, #{user_email}, #{user_name}, #{user_pw}, #{user_cell}, #{user_birth}, #{user_active}, #{user_position}, #{user_regdate})
mapper.select: select user_id from user_user where user_id = #{user_id}
select user_email from user_user where user_email = #{user_email}
mapper.insert: insert into email_verify(email, code, expire_time, joinreset) values (#{email}, #{code}, #{expire_time}, #{joinReset})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_role, user_email, user_name, user_cell, user_birth, user_position, department_name, user_employeenumber from user_user u left join user_department d on u.department_id = d.department_id where u.user_id = #{user_id}
